AnalystsTest.Text:
4/13/2017 10:28:25 AM
Bullet train or Better trains - What does India need?

India need a better trains to travel from one place to another place with good facilities and good services.Usaullay in our country we have a habit of using the local trains in our daily life. Normally most of them like to travel in train than bus or other services. Many think that train is comfortable and secure to travel.India need to improve the facillities in railway.most of the trains does not have a good food to the public.I think in india we should have a bullet trains also but many of them are not in use, so it will be difficult to the person who use for the frist time.But later it will be habituated to every common man.Many people in india perfer train for travelling long distance or short distance.Old people also pefer train to travel anyever.

                                                                 India have best services in Railway department,recently it have incresed the ticket charges and salaries to the employees.India have taken a metro rail project from past three years,many people working on it to complete the project as soon as possible.If the project is compeleted than we do not have much traffic on road because many people travell on metro rail.There will not be a traffic jam problem in future.India should bring many changes required for the development.

                                                                       If people start travelling in train or metro rail then our country will be traffic free country.Most of them in India uses train in thier daily life.I think our government should change certain facilities and implement new tecnology in train.In train we have to change washroom facilities.In train we can enjoy very much while travelling.Train journey gives you good experiance and It makes you to meet with different people.You can make memories while travelling with diifferent kind of people.

                                                                        Travelling makes your mind fresh and to learn many new things from each place.You get a chance of visting adventures place when you travel.Many of them learn many things from each other.I like travelling so much.

                                                                           In Mumbai 70% of people travel in local train itself.Mainly job holders perfer train to travel because they can reach their office in time.If trains are not working for one day also 50% of people do not go for the job.There people have got habituate to trains in their daily life.Not only in Mumbai some other places also train is means of transport  in their day to day life.Most of them do not perfer train food to eat.

                                                                             Indian Railway system need to change the food facilities in train.Bullet train are also have good facilities in their railway services.In train we can travel fast to reach our destiny.Many people love to travel in train for a long distance.we can enjoy with our friends when we travel in train for hoilday trip.

                                                                           Travelling in train has many advantages.we can travel with full security.Trains have three class of seat arranging they are divided  according to their facilities requied for a customer.Frist class is A/c coach and second class is sleeping coach or reservation for birth seat and last but not least third class is general coach.Poeple do not use general coach while traveling to long distance.They perfer frist class or second class.
